					Arrays
DESCRIPTION
This section will guide you to:
• Create a Java project in your IDE
• Write a Java program to create arrays


	package arrays;
	public class ArrayImplement 
	{
		public static void main(String[] args) 
		{
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
			int a[] = new int[5];
			int n = 5;
			for(int i = 0; i <= n; i++) 
			{
				System.out.println("Elements in Array Are : "+ i);
			}
		}
	}
	
	
OUTPUT

Elements in Array Are : 0
Elements in Array Are : 1
Elements in Array Are : 2
Elements in Array Are : 3
Elements in Array Are : 4
Elements in Array Are : 5
